availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John T. Thornbury (Hart County, Kentucky, shoe & boot maker)

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, shoe & boot maker. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Hodges in Hart County, Kentucky, on November 23, 1856. Father of William Thornsberry, Mary E. Thornsberry, and Hiram W. Thornsberry. Shoe & boot maker in Hart County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, Hammonsville, p. 860.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, Hammonville, p. 276B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994038, Hart County Marriages.
